entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Bouctouche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to ice pellets or freezing rain near noon then to rain in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
